instruction: Communicate the given idea or message to the designated recipient in no more than 100 words.
input:
Idea: You should remind your friends to take care of their environment
Recipient: Friends
output: Hey friends, don’t forget to take care of your environment! Every small action counts towards a better future. We can start by recycling, conserving energy, opting for reusable packaging, and more. Let’s make our planet healthier and cleaner!
